title: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When attempting to cancel the process of adding an exception breakpoint in the breakpoints pane of the debug perspective, no action or effect is observed.
EB: After clicking cancel in the progress dialog while adding an exception breakpoint, the process should be aborted and no exception breakpoint should be added.
SR: 1) Open the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective. 2) Click the J! button to add an exception breakpoint. 3) In the progress dialog that appears, click the cancel button to abort the process of adding the exception breakpoint.
